name: Alienxplode
description:
Enjoy the fun of hide and seek in a new way. Up to 4  friends trying to kill each other while hidding themselves in the crowd.

Controls MoveAttackPlayer 1WASDLeft CtrlPlayer 2Arrows / Joystick 1 Left StickRight Ctrl/ Joystick Button 2Player 3Joystick 2 Left StickJoystick Button 2Player 4Joystick 3 Left StickJoystick Button 2

This game was made for the Game Jam + 2018 in 48h, by The Overconfident Llamas team. 

We are looking for votes!

 Help us get to the National Finals of Game Jam +.

  

Work in progress

We are still working on this game. Stay tuned for updates!
